name: Shopping Mall Taxi Simulator
description:
Welcomes to best family taxi driving games where you are supposed to drive the luxury taxi in a shopping mall to pick and drop the family passengers for fun. Avail chance of being awesome driver in shopping mall. You have been gone through many taxi games but let us assure you that it has real life fun for you in shapes of many missions where you can show your skills of pick and drop. Are you ready to experience the awesome driving with shopping mall taxi, then lets play this endless driving games for free!

Features for Shopping Mall Taxi
- Best Taxi driving Simulator game
- Amazing and realistic Shopping Mall environment
- Realistic HD graphics and sound effects
- Challenging Cart driving missions
- Time Management Game
Download Now for Free!
